com.dotcms.publishing

Class PublisherAPIImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dotcms.publishing.PublisherAPIImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PublisherAPI

    public class PublisherAPIImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PublisherAPI

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PublisherAPIImpl() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PublishStatus publish(PublisherConfig config)
      This method call will create and send to an specified Environments a Bundle, in order to do that it will follow this main steps:
      Calls all the registered IBundlers associated to a specified Publisher (IPublisher.getBundlers())
      in order generate for each of them the different parts and objects of the bundle we are trying to create. The Publisher will call it process method (Publisher.process(PublishStatus)) in order to compress
      all the generated content by the Bundlers and create the final Bundle file that will be send to a specific Environment.
      PublishStatus publish(PublisherConfig config, PublishStatus status)
      This method call will create and send to an specified Environments a Bundle, in order to do that it will follow this main steps:
      Calls all the registered IBundlers associated to a specified Publisher (IPublisher.getBundlers())
      in order generate for each of them the different parts and objects of the bundle we are trying to create. The Publisher will call it process method (Publisher.process(PublishStatus)) in order to compress
      all the generated content by the Bundlers and create the final Bundle file that will be send to a specific Environment.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PublisherAPIImpl

        public PublisherAPIImpl()

    • Method Detail

      • publish

        public PublishStatus publish(PublisherConfig config)
                      throws DotPublishingException
        Description copied from interface: PublisherAPI
        This method call will create and send to an specified Environments a Bundle, in order to do that it will follow this main steps:
        • Calls all the registered IBundlers associated to a specified Publisher (IPublisher.getBundlers())
          in order generate for each of them the different parts and objects of the bundle we are trying to create.
        • The Publisher will call it process method (Publisher.process(PublishStatus)) in order to compress
          all the generated content by the Bundlers and create the final Bundle file that will be send to a specific Environment.
        Specified by:
        publish in interface PublisherAPI
        Parameters:
        config - Class that have the main configuration values for the Bundle we are trying to create
        Returns:
        The status of the Bundle creation process
        Throws:
        DotPublishingException - If there is an exception on the publish process
        See Also:
        IBundler, Publisher, Environment

      • publish

        public PublishStatus publish(PublisherConfig config,
                    PublishStatus status)
                      throws DotPublishingException
        Description copied from interface: PublisherAPI
        This method call will create and send to an specified Environments a Bundle, in order to do that it will follow this main steps:
        • Calls all the registered IBundlers associated to a specified Publisher (IPublisher.getBundlers())
          in order generate for each of them the different parts and objects of the bundle we are trying to create.
        • The Publisher will call it process method (Publisher.process(PublishStatus)) in order to compress
          all the generated content by the Bundlers and create the final Bundle file that will be send to a specific Environment.
        Specified by:
        publish in interface PublisherAPI
        Parameters:
        config - Class that have the main configuration values for the Bundle we are trying to create
        status - Object that store the status of the Bundle on all of its stages
        Returns:
        The status of the Bundle creation process
        Throws:
        DotPublishingException - If there is an exception on the publish process
        See Also:
        IBundler, Publisher, Environment
